title: Mercury Transit in the 12th House for Gemini Ascendant
summary: Mercuryâ€™s transit through the twelfth house turns the mind inward and highlights solitude, reflection, and behind-the-scenes activity. Thoughts become more private, imaginative, and introspective. This phase supports research, spiritual study, and work done away from the spotlight. While intuition and subtle understanding increase, mental overthinking or isolation can rise if communication is completely withdrawn.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Preference for silence over constant interaction

sections.heading: Career
points: Favorable for research and confidential tasks
Work in foreign or isolated environments benefits
Avoid lack of clarity with coworkers

sections.heading: Finance
points: Expenses may rise on travel or solitude needs
Good time to review financial leaks

sections.heading: Mental / Inner State
points: Mind seeks rest and quiet processing

closing: This transit invites mental retreat and inner clarity. When silence is balanced with awareness, deep insight emerges.
